R

random - Static variable in class engine.Engine
A random variable used throughout the program, seeded either by argument or random.
randomiseWeights(double[][], boolean) - Method in class deliberativeLayer.DecisionNetwork
Generates random weights for all layers in the DecisionNetwork, or fills the weights with zeros if randomise is false.
reactiveLayer - package reactiveLayer
 
reactiveLayer - Variable in class physicalLayer.Agent
The reactive network used to hill-climb towards sub-goals.
ReactiveLayer - Class in reactiveLayer
A class to model the decision-making processes for reactive behaviour.
ReactiveLayer(int, int) - Constructor for class reactiveLayer.ReactiveLayer
Creates an empty 2D activity landscape to model the decision-making processes for reactive behaviour, without no initial targets.
RealTimeGraph - Class in engine
A class to generate a 2D line graph that can be used to visualise performance in real-time.
RealTimeGraph(String, int) - Constructor for class engine.RealTimeGraph
Creates a graph for performance based on a dataset that will be updated with data in real-time, with the x-axis as "Generation" and the y-axis as "Fitness".
removeObject() - Method in class physicalLayer.Cell
Removes any objects from the cell.
reset() - Method in class physicalLayer.Agent
Reset the current state, including starting location, moves, whether it is alive etc.
reset() - Method in class physicalLayer.PhysicalLayer
Reset the environment to a clean state.
resetAll() - Method in class physicalLayer.PhysicalLayer
Reset the environment to a clean state.
Resource - Class in physicalLayer
A class to model a Resource object, which has a location.
Resource(Cell) - Constructor for class physicalLayer.Resource
Creates a non-dangerous Resource object with a location.
resources - Variable in class physicalLayer.PhysicalLayer
A collection of the Resource objects in the environment, which are to be collected so goals can be achieved.
resourcesFound - Variable in class physicalLayer.Agent
The number of Resource objects that have been found.
ROWS - Static variable in class engine.Engine
The number of rows in the 2D environment.
rows - Variable in class engine.ViewPanel
The number of rows in the environment.
rows - Variable in class physicalLayer.Agent
The number of rows in the environment.
rows - Variable in class physicalLayer.PhysicalLayer
The number of rows.
rows - Variable in class reactiveLayer.NeuralNetwork
The number of rows.
running - Variable in class engine.Engine
A boolean to track whether the run has finished or not (false if all agents have reached their goal, or the max steps has been reached).
